name: Legacy Puzzle
description:
🥰 Game Content 🥰

Legacy Puzzle is a relaxing puzzle game. The different puzzles are all real-life paintings from the French painter François Poirel.

The game is composed of 28 puzzles with currently 2 different difficulties:
- Vertical puzzles have 60 pieces
- Horizontal puzzles have 24 pieces

📬 Project news 📬
  • 🧐  Next Update: The next update will allow you to choose the difficulty for each puzzle. More features will be added depending on the feedback we get
  • 💖 Now available: Legacy Puzzle is now available on Itch.io!
📝 Credits 📝

Music: Dimitri Kovalchuk - "Purple Horizon"
Paintings: François Poirel (do not reuse paintings without proper credits)
Font: GGBotNet - "Kaph Font"
Programming: SinGala
